automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_to_office_wled_night_pulse'
alias: Living Room Lights Trigger Office WLED at Night
description: "When any living room light is turned on between 9 PM and 11 PM, pulse Office WLED at 20% for 10 seconds"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    # NOTE: Replace the entity_id below with your actual living room light/group entity in the UI
    entity_id: light.wled
    to: 'on'
conditions:
  - condition: time
    after: '21:00:00'
    before: '23:00:00'
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_pulse
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 20
  - delay: '00:00:10'
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_pulse'

issues.recommendation: Verify entity scene.office_wled_before_pulse' exists in Home Assistant. This entity was not validated during generation - consider using a validated entity instead.

warnings.recommendation: Verify entity scene.office_wled_before_pulse' exists in Home Assistant. This entity was not validated during generation - consider using a validated entity instead.

message: YAML generated but deployment failed: HTTP 400: Message malformed: not a valid value for dictionary value @ data['actions'][3]['target']['entity_id']
